name: LinklemoVoiceControlSkills
0:
”Alexa, turn on name”
”Alexa, turn off name”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Linklemo Voice Control Skills, the user can control the doorbells, PTZ camera, cube camera, bullet camera by voice, and ensure that the device accurately identifies user instructions.
 
After connecting Alexa to your Linklemo Smart products in a few simple steps:

(1). Download our"Linklemo"app in android or ios app market

(2) Register one Linklemo account in our "Linklemo"app

(3). You need to have some Linklemo smart devices in hand. Such as doorbells, PTZ camera, cube camera, bullet camera

(4). Configure these devices in our"Linklemo app and change appropriate name for your devices which wilt be used in "Linklemo Voice Control Skills" 

(5). Download Amazon"Alexa "app from android, is or Amazon app market

(6). Configure Echo with"Alexa"app

(7). Search"Linklemo Voice Control Skills" from the"Alexa app skills" category

(8). Click Enable skill of "Linklemo Voice Control Skills, and you'll be navigated to Linklemo login page

(9). Input your Linklemo account username and password, you' ll be redirect to the success paqe 

(10). Now all setup is finished
